title: Black Screen in Arranging Team
body:
So, this happens like once every two weeks or so. Randomly, when I load into the new draft system, it turns black. It always works the day before with no difficulties and EVERY time I have to reinstall or repair my league client which can take anywhere from 30 minutes to a few hours. I don't have any third party programs installed or anything; it's a completely vanilla League client. I don't know if there's anyone else having these problems and if so, are there any known fixes other than repairing/reinstalling League?
Thanks

replies.body:
That sounds odd, if you have to perform a repair to resolve the issue it sounds to me like something is causing file corruption.

*  What antivirus are you running?
*  Have you added the LoL directory to your antivirus' exceptions? (C:\Riot Games\ by default)
*  How long have you had the computer for? It's possible your drive could be experiencing issues, have you had any similar problems in any other games/applications installed onto the same partition?
